entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • emulator chashes when dragged on second screen #26211
  • Enable .NET MAUI on source.dot.net #26210
    .NET 9 SR2
  • VisualState does not reset when it is set from an implicit style and the style is removed/changed #26208
  • Local resources not working in release configuration with more than one resource inside #26206
  • Android - CollectionView scroll wrong item when set animation is false #26191
  • MAUI Templates are not visible in Visual Studio #26189
  • [MAUI] Select items traces are preserved #26187
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [MAUI]I8_Header and Footer-Name textbox is cut off #26186
  • Similar name is provided for "Icons" Present: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Name Role Value. #26185
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • It will freeze when 1 minutes later when I show some graphicsView? #26184
  • StringFormat='{0:c}' doesn't show dollar sign in .NET MAUI 9 #26183
  • CollectionView's Items Aren't Selected When a Parent Has a TapGestureRecognizer #26182
  • ScrollView seem wrong with Border.Stroke Thickness change #26181

Closed

  • [Windows] - Top Tab Visibility Changes Not Reflected Until Tab Switch #25913
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Win: Button clicked event and command will not be occurred in EmptyView of CollectionView #19609
    .NET 9 SR2
  • How to write the registry #26207
  • [ci] Fix signing identities missing on some bots #25948
    .NET 9 SR2
  • XAML errors frequently do not reference the file with an issue #21038
    .NET 9 SR2
  • MAUI 9 Shell Tabbar does not work on iOS with more than 5 tabs #26164
  • An issue with Microsoft.Maui.Animations when testing a custom busy indicator control. #22055
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Add new templates to localization #26175
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Shell FlyoutItem Title always disappears strangely #26195
  • Get localization lcl translations handback working #26176
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Label display bug #26151
  • Crash on IOS adding items to an ObservableCollection after Render #25707
  • MAUI 8.0.82 raises on Android Javax.Crypto.AEADBadTagException #24986
  • [Android] Line breaks not occurring when pressing Enter in Entry configured as multiline, even with ImeOptions set to None. #25952
  • Unpackaged windows build does not include font resources #25929
  • RadioButton not visible on iOS - ContentPage #23937
  • .Net 8 MAUI Memory Leaks after navigating to multiple pages and then navigating to root page. #24409
  • MSBuild <Include /> (global using directive) does not work for platform-specific namespaces #23986
  • Image and Font Failed to load on iPhone 15 plus which results to a white empty page #25796
  • NU1100 & NU1103 396 erreurs je ne sais plus quoi faire #25714
  • NET MAUI app template not available on Visual Studio #25808
  • `ViewHandler<TVirtualView, TPlatformView>.PlatformView` getter throws `InvalidOperationException` #25908
  • .NET MAUI 9 does not support Android 14.0 (API 34) #25898
  • .NET Maui app crashes on startup on 17.10.5 #25963

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Fixed CollectionView SelectedItem binding issue on initial loading" #26212
    i/regression, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Implement ContextMenu UITest extension methods #26204
    area-testing
  • Fixed the double tap editor freeze issue and added test cases #26203
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Fixed [Windows] TabbedPage current page indicator can be wrong #26202
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • Child Span font attributes inheritance #26197
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Fix issue with template processing #26196
    area-templates, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fixed Editor vertical text alignment not working after toggling IsVisible #26194
    community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 22 #26193
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Provided description for "checkboxes", "clear" and "New Task" button #26192
    area-templates, community ✨, t/a11y
  • Able to cancel WebAuthenticator.AuthenticateAsync programmatically using a CancellationToken #26137 #26180
    area-essentials, community ✨

Merged

  • [Windows] - Fix for Shell Section Visibility changes not reflected until Tab switch #26130
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Windows] Disable HitTest when showing EmptyView on CollectionView #26006
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, .NET 9 SR2
  • [ci] See if we can provision by default on devdiv #26170
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Fix randomly failing tests on CI #26120
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Added ToggleSystemAnimations method to Appium helper methods #26096
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, .NET 9 SR2
  • [XC] Add file info to exception reports #25359
    area-xaml, p/0, .NET 9 SR2
  • Make MauiAppCompatEditText public #26146
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-entry
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 19 #26100
    area-testing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fixed An issue with Microsoft.Maui.Animations when testing a custom busy indicator control. #26051
    area-animation, area-drawing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Add three templates to locproject.json #26178
    area-templates, area-localization, .NET 9 SR2
  • Change Yaml to use OneLocTool to create PR after we receive the lcl files #26177
    area-templates, area-localization, .NET 9 SR2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 13330: Build ID 10628913 #26174

Updated

  • Fixed crash when calling ItemsView.ScrollTo on unloaded CollectionView #25444
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [Android] Toolbar overflow menu icon color #25627
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Fix Tweener leak on Animation #26143
    area-animation, community ✨, memory-leak 💦
  • [iOS] Put the UIScrollView into a UIView in a border handler #25098
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fixed Extra Padding on iOS buttons required when image on top or bottom #26018
    community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [ci] Remove use of System.Formats.Asn1 by removing Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Core #26163
    area-infrastructure, area-sfi, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Fix for ItemSpacing not properly applied between the item and group header in CollectionView Horizontal LinearItemsLayout #25882
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Added tests to validate the ItemsUpdatingScrollMode property in CarouselView #26160
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, area-testing
  • [iOS][Regression] Fix ToolbarItem color when used with IconImageSource is always default color #26048
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • Add options for specifying a minimum workload version requirement #25993
    .NET 9 SR2
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨, area-controls-contextmenu, .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Fixed HeaderFooterGrid to pass on CV1 and CV2 #26022
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix gesture crash navigating #19517
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, stale, area-gestures
  • [UI Test] Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #21897
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, area-keyboard
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 17 #26081
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 14 #25989
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 20 #26142
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 21 #26168
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Support for Setting Switch Off State Color #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix for Tabs does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 18 #26097
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 11 #25855
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 16 #26029
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Avoid infinite loop when calculating a DesiredSize #26087
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
